author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...HELENE MOVING INTO THE SOUTHEASTERN GULF OF MEXICO... ...PREPARATIONS TO PROTECT LIFE AND PROPERTY FROM STORM SURGE AND  DAMAGING WINDS ALONG THE FLORIDA BIG BEND COAST SHOULD BE RUSHED TO  COMPLETION TODAY...
summary:
...HELENE MOVING INTO THE SOUTHEASTERN GULF OF MEXICO... ...PREPARATIONS TO PROTECT LIFE AND PROPERTY FROM STORM SURGE AND  DAMAGING WINDS ALONG THE FLORIDA BIG BEND COAST SHOULD BE RUSHED TO  COMPLETION TODAY...
 As of 1:00 PM CDT Wed Sep 25
 the center of Helene was located near 22.0, -86.4
 with movement NNW at 10 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 980 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 80 mph.
